name: Slime Mayhem, 0.1 {BETA}
description:
A  & D are the controls < >, 'Space' is for jumping. [DISCLAIMER: Download doesnt work without all its files with it, So extract the zip file, then look for "Slime _Mayhem.exe"], And if it says "windows protected your PC", just click on 'more info', then click on 'run anyway' {AND IF YOU CAN'T GET OUT OF THE TAB WITH 'ESC', TAP ON THE WINDOWS LOGO ON YOUR PC!!!!}

> Mac, extract file, Go find: Slime Mayhem Beta (Mac) Mac Slime mayhem.app > Contents > MacOS > Slime_Mayhem
